title: How to Do Codecs Conversation With the Snake and Starfox Team

steps.headline: Do this all in practice.
steps.description: If you get hit by anyone while doing this, it could stop everything.

steps.headline: For the first snake, pick a snake as your player and anyone you want to know about.
steps.description: Anyone that calls snake will talk about his enemy.

steps.headline: Choose shadow Moses island.
steps.description: This is their only place that would allow snake to do this.

steps.headline: This part depends on your controller.
steps.description: If it's a classic controller or Nintendo 64 controller use the D-pad (any arrow) if it's a Wii-mote use A and D-pad (any arrow) if it's a Wii-mote and nunchuck use 2.

steps.headline: Rapidly press your controllers button.
steps.description: Snake should get in a box for a while then lift it off. If done correctly he will be crouching and kind of nodding. If it isn't working either tap faster or slower. Still not working, run around the map to rest your fingers then continue.

steps.headline: When he gets up, you should see a box saying "AUX call press select".
steps.description: After that either mei ling, octacon or campbell will talk to you about your enemy.

steps.headline: If you're fighting falco slippy will call.
steps.description: He officially hacked in the server. He will still give away tips.

steps.headline: If you pick falco, fox, or wolf as your player you get different effects.
steps.description: Instead of shadow Moses island pick lylat cruise.

steps.headline: After that rapidly press the controllers button.
steps.description: You would see your character shake his fist for a bit and salute.

steps.headline: Nothing will happen till you go to warp speed.
steps.description: After warp speed your team will talk about you or about the other team. It's not as useful as snakes conversation but they're interesting.

text: Do this all in practice. If you get hit by anyone while doing this, it could stop everything. For the first snake, pick a snake as your player and anyone you want to know about. Anyone that calls snake will talk about his enemy. Choose shadow Moses island. This is their only place that would allow snake to do this. This part depends on your controller. If it's a classic controller or Nintendo 64 controller use the D-pad (any arrow) if it's a Wii-mote use A and D-pad (any arrow) if it's a Wii-mote and nunchuck use 2. Rapidly press your controllers button. Snake should get in a box for a while then lift it off. If done correctly he will be crouching and kind of nodding. If it isn't working either tap faster or slower. Still not working, run around the map to rest your fingers then continue. When he gets up, you should see a box saying "AUX call press select". After that either mei ling, octacon or campbell will talk to you about your enemy. If you're fighting falco slippy will call. He officially hacked in the server. He will still give away tips. If you pick falco, fox, or wolf as your player you get different effects. Instead of shadow Moses island pick lylat cruise. After that rapidly press the controllers button. You would see your character shake his fist for a bit and salute. Nothing will happen till you go to warp speed. After warp speed your team will talk about you or about the other team. It's not as useful as snakes conversation but they're interesting.
